title: Rhythm 0
dot:
digraph Rhythm0{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box];Performance[label="Rhythm 0
- 6-hour endurance art performance
- Marina Abramović, 1974"];Audience[label="Audience Interaction
- Invited to use 72 objects
- Included items like:
  - rose
  - gun
  - scissors"];Purpose[label="Purpose
- Explore limits of public behavior
- Investigate power dynamics
- Examine human psychology"];Reception[label="Reception
- Ranked 9th best performance art piece (2013)
- Noted for its intensity and impact"];Objects[label="Objects Used
- Items ranged from gentle (rose) to harmful (gun)
- Audience actions escalated over time"];Consequences[label="Consequences
- Violent actions led to aggressive atmosphere
- Abramović felt violated
- Highlighted extremes of human behavior"];Performance->Audience;Performance->Purpose;Audience->Objects;Audience->Consequences;Purpose->Reception;Objects->Consequences;}
